mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PY_PCR_CRS_CRT_SZBSI_IS( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, TRN_ID, INSURE_PAY, FACT_INSURE_PAY, CURRENT_STATUS, INFO_DATE, LAST_UNIT_NAME, APP_ID ) VALUES( sys_guid(), sysdate, #{crtUser}, #{trnId}, #{insurePay}, #{factInsurePay}, #{currentStatus}, #{infoDate}, #{lastUnitName}, #{appId} )
